Text: SVMG Media Training Workshop with Tripp Frohlichstein April You are invited to take part in our annual Media Training Workshop featuring Tripp Frohlichstein of Media Masters He is a master at teaching this program and has done a great job at informing as well as entertaining previous workshop attendees This years workshop helpful to both beginner and experienced professionals who currently work or desire to work with the media is being held at Cadence Design Systems on April th and th and is cosponsored by the San Jose Silicon Valley Chamber of Commerce The registration fee for this event varies from to Please see the attached registration form or click on our press hat icon on the SVMG home page at wwwsvmgorg for more information and a further description on this exciting program Please contact Michelle or myself for more information Best regards Michael Wero Associate Communications Silicon Valley Manufacturing Group p f Michelle MontagueBruno Director Communications Silicon Valley Manufacturing Group p f mediatrainworkshopdoc
